title: India, Chile announce start of negotiations for comprehensive trade pact
description: NEW DELHI: India and Chile on Tuesday announced they will begin negotiations for a comprehensive trade pact as Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Chilean President Gabriel Boric explored new avenues for cooperation in defence, critical minerals and technology. title: India, Chile decide to start talks on comprehensive trade pact
description:
India, Chile decide to start talks on comprehensive trade pact
